channel.title: Books on Tonny Mutai

item.title: A Day and a Life
item.description: To the reader of this book and the curious a like thank you for checking out this book. Truthfully, this is was a random thought that crossed my mind. Having read some of the photography books, i thought i could write one too. I gathered some of the best photos i have taken and decided to do storytelling with them. Hopefully this is the first of many to come. This is a self-published book and freely available for download.
